Dysarthric Speech Recognition and Offline Handwriting Recognition using Deep Neural Networks

Investigate use of deep neural networks in automatic speech recognition for people with Cerebral Palsy, Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis and Parkinsons disease, and recognition of handwritten characters in scanned documents.
